timeline.title: Chief Technology Officer
timeline.description: Leading technology strategy and innovation as CTO, overseeing all technical aspects of the company.
achievements: Providing technology leadership and strategic direction
Driving technological innovation and digital transformation

timeline.title: Head of Development
timeline.description: Leading development teams and managing technical projects while implementing modern development practices.
achievements: Led development teams and managed project lifecycles
Implemented CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices
Improved developer relations and team collaboration

timeline.title: UI Designer
timeline.description: Designed user interfaces and improved user experience for various digital products.
achievements: Created intuitive and user-friendly interface designs
Improved user experience through iterative design

timeline.title: Software Engineer
timeline.description: Developed and maintained software solutions with focus on mobile applications and automation.
achievements: Led technical teams on various projects

timeline.title: Android Developer
timeline.description: Specialized in Android application development using modern technologies and best practices.

timeline.title: Graphic Designer
timeline.description: Providing creative design solutions for various clients as a freelance graphic designer.
achievements: Created visual designs for multiple clients
Delivered print and digital design solutions

timeline.title: Software Developer
timeline.description: Working as an independent software developer on various projects and technologies.

timeline.title: Start-up Owner
timeline.description: Founded and managed a start-up company focusing on innovative solutions.

timeline.title: Web Developer
timeline.description: Developed web solutions and applications for clients.

timeline.title: Designer and CNC Operator
timeline.description: Combined design skills with CNC machine operation for manufacturing.
achievements: Created technical designs for CNC production

timeline.title: Computer Numerical Control Operator
timeline.description: Operated CNC machines and managed production processes.

timeline.title: Heating Air Conditioning Technician

timeline.description: Provided HVAC technical support and maintenance in the oil and gas industry.
